column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Visiting from MN!  We were recommended to go here by many people.  It was a short walk from our hotel.  We ordered a small "The Malnati Chicago Classic".  It was plenty for my wife and I. The crust was definitely the best part of the pizza.  I've definitely had better pizza before
column2: but overall it was a good pizza and we had great time.  It was very reasonably priced.
